sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of PayPal Holdings ( PYPL ) topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 9.8%.
Year to date, PayPal Holdings registers a 15.6% gain.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is Valero Energy Corp ( VLO ), trading down 9.2%.
Valero Energy Corp is showing a gain of 2.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are State Street ( STT ), trading down 7.6%, and Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ), trading up 7.7% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
